text: Eck en Wiel () is a village in the Dutch province of Gelderland. It is a part of the municipality of Buren, and lies about 9 km southwest of Veenendaal. In 2001, the village of Eck en Wiel had 820 inhabitants in the built-up area. The built-up area of the town was 0.18 km², and contained 324 residences.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Bevolkingskernen in Nederland 2001 . (Statistics are for the continuous built-up area). The statistical area "Eck en Wiel", which also can include the peripheral parts of the village, as well as the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 1720.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005 . As of 1 January 2005. The population of 1720 was the same in 2008.Statistics Netherlands (CBS), Gemeente op maat Buren 09 . The Dutch branch of L'Abri has its residential study center located in the village.http://www.labri.nl/wp/en/events/categories/residential-study-centre/ ==References== Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Buren
title: Eck en Wiel
